column17:
This beautiful saree by Garden in alluring green colour has a contrasting overall red border. The pleats are decorated with beautiful embroidery in floral designs. Attract all the glares wherever you go in this beautiful saree.

Features

  • Category: Traditional and Ethnic Wear
  • Type: Sarees
  • Fabric: Polyester
  • Colour: Green
  • Suitable for: Casual and light party occasions
  • Saree Length (in mts.): 5.4
  • Blouse Length (in mts.): 0.80

Wash & Care
Wash with like colours.
Do not soak tumble dry or bleach.
Mild iron.
Line dry
